dc_title_s: Ceretica sive Cardiganensis comitatus: Cardigan schire.; Ceretica sive Cardiganensis comitatvs: Cardigan schire;Ceredigion;Cardiganshire
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Includes illustrations of ships in the ocean and a decorative title cartouche topped with a blank coat of arms in the top right corner, as well as a blank cartouche with a sphere atop it in the lower right corner. Printing includes extensive flourishes. Does not match any states listed in Van der Krogt. From the Jansson Appendix Atlas 1636-1680, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 37 x 48 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Appendix Atlas.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.
